headline.main: The Home Front, Through a Child's Eyes

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As I am the same age as Jean S. Arbeiter, I can place her Nov. 23 Op-Ed article about the bravery of American children on the home front during World War II into personal context -- and it is discomforting.
abstract: George Beres letter on Jean S Arbeiter's Nov 23 article rejects suggestion that American children, never subjected to true horrors of war, were home-front heroes during World War II; drawing
snippet: To the Editor:    As I am the same age as Jean S. Arbeiter, I can place her Nov. 23 Op-Ed article about the bravery of American children on the home front during World War II into personal context -- and it is discomforting....
